1233700.name: Mad Ball - Human Theme Characters
1233700.description:
3 new characters, inspired by humans.

Viking - heavy class.
Knight - support class.
Gladiator - assassin class.

Each character includes 5 unlockable skins and model upgrade parts.

Each character includes a new unique special attack, and this attack is linked to the weapon.
Weapons also include different special stats like scale/speed/power, which can be utilized by the feature of mixing weapons within classes.

You can equip class weapons on any other skin within the same class.

By buying this DLC, you support the development of Mad Ball, and makes it possible for us to create more content.
All skins are unlocked immediately after purchase.
